dset_list = [dset for dset in [dClient.show_dataset(hst['id']) for hst in h_list] if dset['state'] == "ok" and dset['peek'] is not None] dset_list = [dset for dset in dset_list if str(output_chk) in dset['peek']] dset_df = pandas.DataFrame(dset_list) dset_list = dset_df[["hid","name","id"]] print dset_list

merge_df = pandas.merge(dset_list, path_df, how='right', on='id', left_index=False, right_index=False) print merge_df
return merge_df
